text: Thomas Ronald "Hawkeye" Webster (October 4, 1948 â€“ April 10, 2020) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player and coach. He was born in Kirkland Lake, Ontario, Canada. His career lasted from 1968 to 1980. He played for the Boston Bruins, Detroit Red Wings, California Golden Seals and the New England Whalers. Webster died on April 10, 2020 of brain cancer at the age of 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario
title: Tom Webster (ice hockey)
